fields.description: [1m[36mTitanium Command-Line Interface[39m[22m, CLI version 3.0.23, Titanium SDK version 3.0.0.GA. when i m creating a project this error occurs.
fields.summary: [1m[36mTitanium Command-Line Interface[39m[22m, CLI version 3.0.23, Titanium SDK version 3.0.0.GA

comments.body:
Hi Parul,

Could you please provide more details about the issue? It is not quite clear from the subject line.

Thanks

hi varun,

This issue occurs when i m trying to create new project. i had reinstall it and found my titanium cli version is not supporting. the cli version i have installed is 3.0.23 and sdk 3.0.0.GA. i hope i make you clear.
If you're talking about [1m[36m that's not a bug. These are color codes. It seems that your shell doesn't support it. Please try titanium --no-colors

We have not heard back from you since the last post by Dmitriy. Not sure if this is fixed for you as per recommendation from Dmitriy. If the error exists, please send us details so that we can take next necessary step to fix. 

There has been many updates to the SDK and CLI as well studio since March 2013. Please try our latest release and give it a try to find many new features and fixes. If we don't hear back, we will assume the issue is no longer valid and close it.
